content:
TITLE: Specifying Pytest Dependency with Version Constraint
DESCRIPTION: This line defines a dependency on pytest version 7.2 or higher. The >= operator indicates that any version of pytest that is 7.2 or newer is acceptable for the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/requirements/test.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
pytest>=7.2
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Python Requirements Dependencies List
DESCRIPTION: List of Python package dependencies including minimum version requirements. Contains packages for development, testing, linting, documentation and versioning.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/requirements/pkgutils.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
setuptools>=59.2.0
wheel>=0.37.0
flake8>=4.0.1
tox>=3.24.4
sphinx2rst>=1.0
bumpversion
pydocstyle
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Dependencies for Celery Vine Project in Python
DESCRIPTION: This snippet lists the required Python packages for the Celery Vine project. It specifies sphinx_celery version 1.1 or higher and includes six as a missing dependency for sphinx_celery.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/requirements/docs.txt#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
sphinx_celery>=1.1
six  # missing dependency in sphinx_celery
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Sphinx Documentation for vine.promises Module
DESCRIPTION: This reStructuredText snippet configures the documentation for the vine.promises module, setting up the table of contents, current module context, and automodule directives to generate API documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/reference/vine.promises.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: restructuredtext
CODE:
```
=====================================================
 vine.promises
=====================================================

.. contents::
    :local:
.. currentmodule:: vine.promises

.. automodule:: vine.promises
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Documentation for vine.abstract Module with reStructuredText
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet configures the Sphinx documentation generation for the vine.abstract module. It sets up the table of contents with local links, sets the current module context, and includes an automodule directive to document all members including undocumented ones.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/reference/vine.abstract.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: reStructuredText
CODE:
```
.. contents::
    :local:
.. currentmodule:: vine.abstract

.. automodule:: vine.abstract
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring RST Documentation for vine.synchronization
DESCRIPTION: RST directives to configure documentation generation for the vine.synchronization module. Includes table of contents, module reference, and autodoc settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/reference/vine.synchronization.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: rst
CODE:
```
.. contents::
    :local:
.. currentmodule:: vine.synchronization

.. automodule:: vine.synchronization
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Sphinx documentation for vine.funtools module
DESCRIPTION: This snippet contains reStructuredText directives that configure how Sphinx should generate documentation for the vine.funtools module. It includes a table of contents, sets the current module, and instructs Sphinx to include all members and undocumented members from the module.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/reference/vine.funtools.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: restructuredtext
CODE:
```
.. contents::
    :local:
.. currentmodule:: vine.funtools

.. automodule:: vine.funtools
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: RST Documentation Structure for vine.utils Module
DESCRIPTION: ReStructuredText documentation setup for the vine.utils module using Sphinx directives. Includes table of contents, current module declaration, and automodule configuration for member documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/reference/vine.utils.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: rst
CODE:
```
=====================================================
 vine.utils
=====================================================

.. contents::
    :local:
.. currentmodule:: vine.utils

.. automodule:: vine.utils
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Supported Versions in Markdown Table
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows a Markdown table that lists the supported and unsupported versions of Celery Vine. It uses checkmarks and X marks to indicate support status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/SECURITY.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Markdown
CODE:
```
| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 5.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 2.0.x   | :x:                |
| 5.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 5.0   | :x:                |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including External Changelog File in reStructuredText
DESCRIPTION: This directive includes the Changelog file from the parent directory into the current documentation. It's a common pattern in reStructuredText to incorporate external files into documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/celery/vine/blob/master/docs/changelog.rst#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: restructuredtext
CODE:
```
.. include:: ../Changelog
```
